s1.message: Translations added: Czech, Norwegian (Bokm√•l), Greek, Ukrainian

s4.message: protocol scheme allows subscribing with two clicks, subscription authors can generate the links with the subscription link factory

s5.message: Subscription authors can now use a comment to specify when the subscription should be downloaded next time (should contain something like

s10.message: Preferences dialog: Improved inline editor's compatibility with various themes

s11.message: Preferences dialog: Fixed an incompatibility with the Plastikfox theme, inline editor would resize the filter tree

s12.message: Preferences dialog: Fixed graphical glitch, list selection wouldn't go away when inline editor is activated

s13.message: Content pane of the NewsFox extension is no longer ignored, elements of the displayed RSS feeds can be blocked now

s14.message: Fixed: Installation in SeaMonkey on Linux sets wrong file permissions

s15.message: Installation in SeaMonkey on Linux now checks write permissions before trying to install

s16.message: Installation won't start in Mozilla Suite any more, an error message mentioning compatible browsers appears instead
